ModInfo.Name: xce (ZH)
ModInfo.Author: Sheepy
ModInfo.Description:
Chinese (Traditional) Translation,
for Xenonauts Community Edition v0.34.2.
Draft version.
Should be placed above most mods, preferably at the top.
Translated mods: Armoured Assault, Extended Weapon Descriptions for Fighters, Geographic addition 1.1, Lore+, X:CE Balance Adjustment, X:CE Base Mod
(Other default enabled X:CE mods don't need translation)
